articles.title: PayTM Shares Sink 12% To Rs 685, Down 70% From Issue Price Of Rs 2150
articles.description: Paytm shares sink 12 per cent to Rs 685 per share early on Monday, down about 70% from its issue price of Rs 2150 per share.
articles.content:
Paytm shares sink 12% early on Monday
Paytm shares sink 12 per cent to Rs 685 per share early on Monday, down about 70% from its issue price of Rs 2150 per share.
